name: security-scan
description: Scans files and directories for security vulnerabilities including hardcoded secrets, eval() usage, SQL injection patterns, XSS patterns, and insecure dependencies using regex-based detection.

path.description: Path to file or directory to scan

maxFileSize.description: Maximum file size to scan in bytes

output.format: { vulnerabilities: [{file, line, type, severity, description}], score, summary }

tokenSavings: Saves 800-2000 tokens by providing structured security analysis instead of manual code review
